com.google.thingbrowser.api
Interface ThingViewFactory

public interface ThingViewFactory

A ThingViewFactory is responsible for creating a ThingView for a given Thing.

TODO(ihab): Should this be an abstract class, ensuring that the supported formats and required facet types are 'final' and therefore cannot be changed by a buggy or malicious implementation?

Method Detail

getSupportedFormat

ViewFormat getSupportedFormat()
Returns:
the ViewFormat supported by ThingViews created by this factory.

getRequiredFacetType

java.lang.Class<? extends Facet> getRequiredFacetType()
Returns:
the set of Facet classes a Thing would have to support in order to be displayed by a view created by this ThingViewFactory.

getPreference

double getPreference()
The "preference level" for this type of view. This number is used by the framework to decide which view to instantiate for a given Thing out of a number of matching possibilities. A higher number indicates the view is more "preferred". There is no maximum or minimum, but a value of zero is considered "neutral". TODO(ihab): This is a hack; fix it!

newView

ThingView newView(Thing thing)
Obtain a view of a specified Thing.

Parameters:
thing - a Thing.
Returns:
a newly created ThingView or null if no such view could be created. TODO(ihab): Improve the interface (especially failure conditions) of this method.
